title: The spies who inspired Bond
itunes:title: The spies who inspired Bond
itunes:subtitle: Henry Hemming on the real historical personalities who Ian Fleming drew on to create 007 and other characters in the Bond novels. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Author and spy expert Henry Hemming discusses the real historical personalities who Ian Fleming drew on to create 007 and other major characters in the Bond novels. Historyextra.com/podcast

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
